briefTitle: PEMF and PEC Blocks in Mastectomy Reconstruction Patients
officialTitle: A Comparison of Pulsed Electromagnetic Fields (PEMF) and Pectoral (PEC) Interfascial Blocks on Postoperative Pain Reduction in Patients Undergoing Mastectomy and Tissue Expander Reconstruction
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects must be female
* Subjects must be 18 years or older
* Subjects must be undergoing unilateral or bilateral mastectomy with tissue expander reconstruction

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergy to all narcotic medications
* Intake of any chronic opioids or pain medications preoperatively for a chronic condition or chronic use.
